description.page_two: The following are some questions about your skillset and experiences that will help us diversify team talents
description.page_three: And now the moment you have been waiting for. Please rank your top five project choices, and indicate your primary motivation for wanting to work on each project you rank. (Note that while this survey allows you to choose the same project for all five ranks, actually doing so will only make things more difficult for yourself and for us if we are not able to honor your top choice).

preferredName.subtext: How would you like to be addressed, if different than your formal name?

gpa.subtext: What is your current overall GPA?

csgpa.subtext: What is your current GPA, only considering your Computer Science classes?

firstChoice.label: First Choice
firstChoice.name: firstChoice
firstChoice.subtext: Select your first preference of project.

firstComment.label: First Preference Motivation
firstComment.name: firstComment
firstComment.subtext: What about this project makes it of interest to you? Please share your primary motivator in choosing this project (e.g."Interest in working with sponsor, " "Web app development, " "Opportunities to develop skill X," etc.).

ipPreference.subtext: Sponsor preference with respect to Intellectual Property rights has been posted on Moodle. Options range from the sponsors possibly requesting to retain all IP rights, to the students retaining IP rights.

ipOptions.retain: Prefer to retain IP rights to my work
ipOptions.noPref: I don't have a preference to retain IP rights to my work

leadership.subtext: What is your preferred leadership role?

leadershipOptions.strongFollow: Strongly prefer to be a follower rather than a leader
leadershipOptions.preferFollow: Prefer to be a follower, but will lead when necessary
leadershipOptions.preferLead: Prefer to be a leader, but will follow when necessary
leadershipOptions.strongLead: Strongly prefer to be the leader; do not enjoy being a follower

preferredPartners.subtext: Identify any individuals you would like to be on your team.

bannedPartners.subtext: Identify any individuals you would not work well with.
